snippet: Jets Coach Rex Ryan briefly considered asking the rookie quarterback Geno Smith to wear a color-coded wristband Monday night against Atlanta.
abstract: New York Jets coach Rex Ryan briefly considers asking quarterback Geno Smith to wear a color-coded wristband as a teaching aide to ease Smith's decision-making burden when choosing plays; Ryan's decision to reject idea, however, might underscore tight-wire act he has to tread to avoid trampling Smith's confidence.
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Rex Ryan briefly considered asking the rookie quarterback Geno Smith to wear a color-coded wristband Monday night against Atlanta.

headline.main: A Yellow Light for the Jets, but No Color-Coded System
headline.print_headline: A Yellow Light for the Jets, But No Color-Coded System
